name: Hold On for Dear Life
description: Launched on October 30, 2023, $HODL is an ERC-20 memecoin inspired by the popular crypto term "HODL". This term was coined by a Bitcoin enthusiast named GameKyuubi, meaning "Hold On for Dear Life". There is a maximum supply of 1 billion (1,000,000,000) $HODL tokens, and no new tokens can be minted. There is no tax on $HODL buy transactions. However, there is a 6% tax on every sell transaction: a unique mechanism called the "anti-jeet shield." Aiming to eliminate jeets from the crypto sphere, this 6% tax serves two purposes: 3% is redistributed to all $HODL holders, providing them with passive income. The other 3% is allocated to marketing, promoting what is arguably the most recognised crypto term-turned-memecoin. The liquidity of $HODL is locked for one year. Additionally, the contract has been audited, with zero flaws found, ensuring maximum security for investors. The vision for $HODL is simple: to create an era where the jeet mentality is obsolete and to transform everyone into true, diamond-handed HODLERS.
